title: How to solo carry as kha
body: im currently in s4 and i love kha fave champ and im looking to one trick my way out and when i get fed i cant seem to close a game out any tips to solo carry as kha would be greatly appreciated

replies.body:
Get your team feed. Win the lanes for your team they will help win the game. Seriously hit 6 gank like crazy!

Also don't be afraid to go into the enemy jg abd steal there camps it kill him. Odds are your stroger he can't fight you 1v1. Be careful for laners coming to help. Though s4 shouldn't be to much of an issue.

At such low elo you can easily counter jungle and they won't know how to deal with it.
